Lens is also capable of learning from user interactions, allowing it to improve its responses and provide more accurate information over time.

System Details.Name: PRISM
System Details.Why PRISM exists: PRISM exists to provide a professional social media platform that connects people on the blockchain. It aims to address the problems faced by users in the current social media landscape, such as data privacy, freedom of expression, and fraud. It is the first platform to offer a blockchain-based social media experience, ensuring data privacy and security while allowing users to express themselves freely. PRISM is designed to be a safe and secure platform for users to connect, share, and collaborate. It is a pioneer in the industry of agentic social media platforms, providing a unique and innovative solution to the problems faced by users.

Problems.Data Privacy: Users are concerned about the privacy and security of their data on social media platforms. They want to ensure that their personal information is protected and not misused.
Problems.Freedom Of Expression: Users want to express themselves freely on social media platforms without fear of censorship or backlash. They want to be able to share their opinions and ideas without being silenced.
Problems.Fraud And Taxation: Users are concerned about the potential for fraud and taxation on social media platforms. They want to ensure that their financial transactions are secure and that they are not being taken advantage of. Hence PRISM provides a secure and transparent blockchain system that ensures the integrity of financial transactions and protects users from fraud. PRISM Coin is the currency on the platform.
Problems.Data Selling: Users are concerned about the selling of their data by social media platforms. They want to ensure that they have control over their personal information and how it is used. PRISM allows users to choose to sell their data and earn PRISM Coin.

Solution.Description: PRISM is a professional social media platform that connects people on the blockchain. It allows users to create public profiles, share their space and talents, and search a centralized network to filter results. Users can communicate, plan, and negotiate performances, create performance itineraries across the nation, leave feedback and rate other users within the platform, and handle payments through the integrated payment processing system. PRISM is a pioneer in the industry of agentic social media platforms, providing a unique and innovative solution to the problems faced by users.

Features.Connect: Users can communicate, post, tell stories, and share their space and talents.
Features.Jobs: Business users can post jobs and regular users can apply for them. Users can also search a centralized network and filter results.
Features.HandlePayments: Users can use PRISM Coin to handle payments.
Features.DataPrivacy: PRISM provides a secure and transparent blockchain system that ensures the integrity of financial transactions and protects users from fraud.
Features.DataSelling: PRISM allows users to choose to sell their data and earn PRISM Coin. There is no centralized data control, users have the rights over their data and can choose to sell it or not.
